ygData.subject: Say Winkin, what do you sell your rebreathers for?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Winkin, Thanx for the info, what do you sell your rebreathers for? Only succeeding on 1 out of 3 trys means your looking at a price of 3000+ plat for a
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Winkin,

Thanx for the info, what do you sell your rebreathers for? Only succeeding on 1 out of 3 trys means your looking at a price of 3000+ plat for a rebreather. And thats AFTER you succeed on making 3 aqua lungs =|.

All this may be moot if those Verant Bastards allow the mages to cast a 20th level spell to create water stones. If that is put in the game, I'm thinking it will devastate the tinkering trade unless they put something else in the game for us to make.

FizzWizz of tunare
